description: This file defines a React functional component 'Step3' that manages a password setup form with validation, strength indication, and user interaction for a registration flow.

methods.name: handlePasswordChange
methods.description: Handles updating the password state and validates the password on each change.

methods.name: handleConfirmPasswordChange
methods.description: Handles updating the confirmPassword state and checks if passwords match.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Performs final validation and submits the form data.

methods.name: getStrengthInfo
methods.description: Returns label and color info based on password strength score.
